name: Ground Zero
description: Ground Zero is a foundational course facilitated by a life coach that allows young adults (ages 13+) to take ownership of their lives by learning key life lessons that will assist them in making lasting and meaningful changes. Through Ground Zero, individuals can take ownership of their lives by retraining their brains and gaining autonomy over their bodies and choices. Provides a life skills course designed to help individuals understand how powerful they really are by allowing people to take o

howToGetIt: To apply for this program please visit: https://www.cityofdreams.org/join-city-of-dreams. Please note that the application package includes the youth application, liability waiver, child safety survey, youth contract, parent/guardian agreement, and a photo release
